thread.title: LIRR Train Derails At Atlantic Terminal In Brooklyn
thread.title_full: LIRR Train Derails At Atlantic Terminal In Brooklyn

author: skschust
title: LIRR Train Derails At Atlantic Terminal In Brooklyn
text:
NEW YORK (CBSNewYork) — Emergency responders are headed to the scene of a Long Island Rail Road train derailment.
It happened Wednesday morning at the Atlantic Terminal in Brooklyn. The Office of Emergency Management says 18 people were hurt.
. @MTA LIRR train derailment: emergency personnel/traffic & transit delays/road closures near Atlantic Ave & Flatbush Ave, BK
— NYCEM – Notify NYC (@NotifyNYC) January 4, 2017 

Commuters should expect transit delays and road closures near Atlantic Avenue and Flatbush Avenue.
Stay with CBSNewYork.com as this story continues to develop.
